title: La Sel de la terre
creator_credit: Georges Rouquier, V. Blavier and Intermondia Films
brief_description: Lyrical impression of the Camargue county at the mouth of the Rhone - long, flat reaches of salt impregnated land, rich in bird and animal life. The latter sequences deal with the draining of the land its fertilization and bringing it into production. Sparse commentary in French.
creator_credit_for_label: Georges Rouquier, V. Blavier and Intermondia Films
